channel.title: Blast Pit: Crash on Load (crashdump inside)
channel.description: Hey gang! I just completed Blast Pit (killed the monster), heading downward the silo ladder into the next area, but the game crashes on load every time. Dump is attached. Thanks! hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T13_20_29C0.mdmp (96.6 KB)

item.title: Blast Pit: Crash on Load (crashdump inside)
item.dc:creator: fr0y0
item.description:
“Solved” by switching to another weapon (from shotgun to crowbar in my case) and jumping down instead of using the ladder.

But it gets better: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14126

Read full topic
item.source: Blast Pit: Crash on Load (crashdump inside)

item.title: Blast Pit: Crash on Load (crashdump inside)

I’m getting the same problem. Was playing yesterday and managed to go down the ladder(jump) but now i can’t anymore.
